mapper.sql: id,classno,leave_no, unit_id,major,username, real_name,phone,start_time, end_time,leave_type,is_evening, remark,url,status, now_order,create_time,complete_time, is_deleted
mapper.insert: insert into leave_info (leave_no, unit_name, major, classno, username, real_name, phone, start_time, end_time, leave_type, is_evening, remark, url, status, now_order, create_time) values (#{leaveNo}, #{unitName}, #{major}, #{classno}, #{username}, #{realName}, #{phone}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{leaveType}, #{isEvening}, #{remark}, #{url}, #{status}, #{nowOrder}, #{createTime});
mapper.select: select li.id, li.leave_no as leaveNo, li.unit_name as unitName, li.major, li.classno as classNo, li.username, li.real_name as realName, li.phone, li.leave_type as leaveType, li.start_time as startTime, li.end_time as endTime, li.is_evening as isEvening, li.remark, li.create_time as createTime, li.url, li.status, li.now_order as nowOrder from leave_info li where li.id = #{id} and li.is_deleted = 0
